Jomar Pascasio

Software Developer / Mobile Developer

Resume

About Me

A highly motivated individual with more than 7 years of experience in software development (mobile and backend development). Proficient in Flutter, React-Native, and native android (Java/Kotlin) for mobile development. Experienced in NodeJS, Java, PHP, Spring-Framework/Spring boot for backend development.

Experience

RipeConcepts Inc.

Senior Mobile Developer
April 2021 - Present

Manages, updates, optimizes, and implements new features in the mobile applications.

  • Revamped the flutter app single-handedly while making necessary improvements to user interface and user experience. In addition, refactored the code architecture and implemented unit tests to achieve far better code maintainability and performance.
  • Developed features that enhanced user engagement, leading to increased traffic and revenue.
  • Conducted mobile application testing to ensure seamless performance across various mobile platforms.
  • Manages the mobile app deployment.
Flutter Android (Kotlin) iOS (Swift) CI/CD (CodeMagic) Spring Framework Docker Firebase

Flarego

Mobile Developer
Sept 2024 - Oct 2024

Developed the user interface for the mobile version of Fox E-loading System

  • E-loading
  • Bills Payment
  • Dashboard
  • Cash-In Services
  • Sign-In / Sign-Up
  • Transactions
  • Account Settings
  • Onboarding
Flutter Android (Kotlin) iOS (Swift) CI/CD (CodeMagic)

Mobii Digital Inc.

Senior Mobile Developer
Aug 2023 - Jul 2024

Manages, updates, optimizes, and implements new features of the peer-to-peer car rental mobile applications

  • Developed the host and renter flow
  • Implemented the KYC utilizing facial biometrics for user verification
  • Integrated Firebase Messaging and Push Notifications
  • Integrated Sentry for application monitoring
  • Refactored and optimized the app performance
  • Manages the CI/CD pipeline
Flutter Android (Kotlin) iOS (Swift) CI/CD (Github Actions) NodeJS Docker Docupass Firebase

Xplus Cloud Solutions Inc.

Mobile Developer
Nov 2015 - Apr 2021

Oversees, enhances, updates, and integrates new features into client mobile applications.

  • Developed an in-house Android SMS application to manage incoming SMS data from the proprietary client app. The application serves as an alternative gateway for transmitting or updating user data when an internet connection is unavailable.
  • Developed a mobile Geographic Information System (GIS) application providing users with detailed information about nearby courts and legal services. The app supports both offline and online usage, offering map and navigation features for enhanced accessibility.
  • Improved the in-house sales force app by optimizing its UI/UX, and completely revamped the underlying code to ensure improved maintainability and enhanced performance.
  • Spearheaded the development of the ride hailing app with React Native for public utility vehicles which incorporate features such as a map, an e-wallet, and NFC tag for enhance payments.
  • Led the development of an e-wallet application featuring cash-in, bill payment, on-demand cash-in, QR scanning, GPS integration with maps, push notifications, and a chatbox functionality.
  • Maintain existing apps by making modifications as required
  • Manages the CI/CD pipeline
Flutter React-Native Android (Java/Kotlin) iOS (Objective-C) CI/CD (Github Actions) NodeJS PHP Google Cloud Firebase
